ch0098_10_hau/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you!
ch0098_10_hau/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s gather our friends and go around Pasio
again today!
ch0098_10_hau/7101_0701_01_10: Y’know what my gramps told me?
ch0098_10_hau/7101_0701_02_10:
“Go beyond winning and losing, and learn to find
joy in any battle... Then you’ll find that you’re
getting strong before you even know it!”
ch0098_10_hau/7101_0701_03_10:
I didn’t understand what it meant at first, but now
I do!
ch0098_10_hau/7102_0701_01_10: When I wear clothes like my grandpa’s...
ch0098_10_hau/7102_0701_02_10:
it makes me feel I’ve gotten a bit closer to
becoming an Island Kahuna.
ch0098_10_hau/7102_0701_03_10:
I want everyone to see me as reliable, just
like my gramps!
ch0098_10_hau/7102_0701_04_10: But to get there, I’ll need to get way stronger!
ch0098_10_hau/7103_0701_01_10:
Back in Alola, my goal was to go around the four
islands and become the island challenge Champion!
ch0098_10_hau/7103_0701_02_10:
Because of that, I was able to beat my grandpa
in an all-out battle!
ch0098_10_hau/7103_0701_03_10:
I also made lots of friends, like Gladion
and Lillie!
ch0098_10_hau/7103_0701_04_10:
I really treasure all those memories and
experiences.
ch0098_10_hau/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s all you gotta do to make people smile!
Just greet ’em like that!
ch0098_10_hau/7104_0701_03_10:
When you’re feeling down, just make sure you
say Alola!
ch0098_10_hau/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you happen to know about Ultra Wormholes,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0098_10_hau/7105_0701_02_10:
When I first saw one, I couldn’t help
feeling excited!
ch0098_10_hau/7105_0701_03_10:
It’s surprising how Pokémon and people can come
from other worlds!
ch0098_10_hau/7105_0701_04_10: I bet there are lots of exciting things still out there!
ch0098_10_hau/1701_0701_01_10:
I got something good! Here, I’ll share some
with you.
ch0098_10_hau/1701_0702_01_10:
I guess the gifts people like differ from person to
person, huh.
ch0098_10_hau/1701_0702_02_10:
I get super excited whenever someone gives me
a malasada.
ch0098_10_hau/2501_0701_01_10:
Dooot doo doo, just a kahuna on a stroll to
the laguna. ♪
ch0098_10_hau/2501_0701_02_10: That’s a song my grandpa’s always singing.
ch0098_10_hau/2501_0701_03_10: Though I’ve never heard it in full...
ch0098_10_hau/2501_0701_04_10: I wonder how the rest of it goes.
ch0098_10_hau/2501_0702_01_10:
Ever since Tapu Koko became my partner
Pokémon, my grandpa’s been teaching me
new things.
ch0098_10_hau/2501_0702_02_10: I wonder if he’ll teach me the rest of that song.
ch0098_10_hau/2511_0701_01_10:
Sharing your partner Pokémon’s intense will
to win...
ch0098_10_hau/2511_0701_02_10:
That sort of thing is important if you wanna win
a serious battle.
ch0098_10_hau/2511_0701_03_10:
If your partner’s always battling hard, you’ve
gotta as well!
ch0098_10_hau/2511_0702_01_10:
There are so many out there who are stronger
than me...
ch0098_10_hau/2511_0702_02_10:
So when I battle, I go all out with that feeling of
never wanting to lose!
ch0098_10_hau/3001_0701_01_10:
I had breakfast this morning, so I’m feeling
great! Now I’m ready to have some fun!
ch0098_10_hau/3003_0701_01_10:
Wanna get some malasadas together? I’m happy
to share with you!
ch0098_10_hau/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m exhausted from all the battling I did today!
I should go to bed soon.
